name: chord-charter
description: Application to convert chordpro files to HTML or PDF

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:html
scripts.build:columns: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:htmlcolumns
scripts.convert: npm run build && npm run pdf
scripts.convert:columns: npm run build:columns && npm run pdf
scripts.serve: nodemon -e scss,hbs,js,cho,chordpro --watch src --watch charts --exec "npm run build && node ./tools/serve.js"
scripts.serve:columns: nodemon -e scss,hbs,js,cho,chordpro --watch src --watch charts --exec "npm run build:columns && node ./tools/serve.js"

author: David Neal <david@reverentgeek.com> (http://reverentgeek.com)
